interact_mat_var_name.description: [string]Name of the material variable to change when the minigame active state changes

alert_mat_var_name.description: [string]Name of the material variable to change when the minigame is set to alert required

show_interface.description: [bool]Toggle whether the Terminal interface is used for this terminal - Some lighter minigames might not need the full terminal experience

screen_type.description: What kind of terminal this is attached to, determines how the in-world UI is positioned

generate_noise.description: Toggle how this terminal generated noise to attract enemies over time while active

spawn_sound_event.description: [wwise]Sound event to play when unit spawns

despawn_sound_event.description: [wwise]Sound event to play when unit despawns

screen_theme.description: Theme for this screen (and all of the minigames associated with it)

noise_timeout.description: How long until noise generation stops after interacting with the terminal.

disable_on_complete.description: [bool]Whether this terminal is disabled when the objective is completed

revert_soon_threshold.description: After this point we alert the playe that revert is soon

appear_on_radar.description: [bool]Whether this terminal appears on the radar

use_for_objective_ui.description: [bool]If true, then the settings for this terminal/minigame will be shown in the objective UI.

require_mover_space_for_interact.description: [bool]If true, then interact is disabled if it is physically blocked

ability_interact_started.description: Playing this ability when a player interacts

ability_interact_ended.description: Playing this ability when a player stops interacting
